Loyalty Management Fields on InternalOrg.name: Loyalty Management Fields on InternalOrganizationUnit
Loyalty Management Fields on InternalOrg.description: Standard fields extend the InternalOrganizationUnit object for use in Loyalty Management to represent to information about Global Promotion Management’s connection with a Marketing Cloud business unit.

BusinessUsage.description: The business purpose of the record.

EmailConfiguration.description: The send classification that’s used by the connected Marketing Cloud business unit to send emails.

OrganizationIdentifier.description: The name of the company’s Marketing Cloud business unit that Global Promotions Management is connected to.
